page.syntax: Result_Flag as L = a5ws_Delete_User(C user_value [,* Localrequest ])

argument.name: Result_Flag
argument.description: .T. = The user was deleted. .F. = The user was not deleted.

argument.name: user_value
argument.description: A unique user value assigned to a user in the web security system. It can be a user 'guid' or a user 'userid'.

argument.name: Localrequest
argument.description: Optional. The Request system variable. It is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

page.description: Delete a web security user in the current project. User_value can be a user 'guid' or a user 'userid'. 'Request' pointer must be provided if run in web page.
page.discussion: The A5WS_Delete_User() deletes a user identified by the user value from the web security system. User_value can be a user 'guid' or a user 'userid'. If the user value is not found, the Result_Flag will return 'False'. Request is added automatically by the server when run from a web page.

see.ref: Deletes a user identified by the user value from the web security system
